c74object.name: fl.cartopol~
c74object.digest: Converts from cartesian values at the inputs to polar values at the outputs.
c74object.description: Conversion may be in 2D or 3D (using spherical coordinates). The outputs are frames of the same length as the longest input. Shorter inputs are padded with zeros prior to conversion.

entry.name: 1. /dimensions [instantiation enum]
entry.description:
Sets the number of dimensions (and hence inputs and outputs).
[0] - 2D [1] - 3D

entry.name: 2. /angles [instantiation enum]
entry.description:
Sets the units used for angles.
[0] - radians [1] - degrees
